newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia Jaya Netting stock down 3.1 pct.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia Jaya Netting stock down 3.1 pct.

text.p: The stock of Jaya Netting Industries Bhd rose on requotation on Wednesday but fell back quickly, dealers said.
About 20 minutes into trading, the stock was down 40 cents or 3.1 percent at 12.30 ringgit. It opened at 13.00 ringgit against its last traded price of 12.70 last Thursday.
Net-maker Jaya Netting said on Friday that it was acquiring Kemayan Construction Sdn Bhd, a unit of Kemayan Corp Bhd, for 120 million ringgit.
Kemayan Construction is expected to generate profit after tax of about 15.86 million ringgit for the financial year ending May 31, 1998, it said.
